myspace.title: President & First Friend
duties: Led MySpace to become the most popular social media platform of its era.
Promoted user engagement by connecting personally with every user as their 'first friend.'
Developed initiatives that encouraged music discovery and social interaction among users.
Oversaw site redesigns and technical upgrades to keep pace with rising user traffic.
Collaborated with artists and creators to make MySpace a hub for content sharing and fan interaction.

friend_to_all.title: Ambassador of Friendship
duties: Traveling the world to promote online and offline friendships among diverse communities.
Hosted talks and panels on the evolution of social media and its impact on society.
Worked with non-profit organizations to create virtual community centers for youth interaction.
Advocating for online safety and digital responsibility in social media use.
Encouraging positive, supportive interactions across various social media platforms.

space_music.name: MySpace Music Discovery
space_music.description: Launched a music discovery feature allowing users to discover and share new music.

first_friend_feature.name: Your First Friend Initiative
first_friend_feature.description: Designed a welcome experience that made every new user feel connected and supported.

friend_reunion_tour.name: Friendship Reunion Tour
friend_reunion_tour.description: Traveled globally to reconnect with former MySpace users and share nostalgic memories.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Digital Media
